comments:
I20050329-2000-gtk

- go to the Java>Build Path>User Libraries pref page
- add a user library, adding any JAR archive
- expand the library, select the access restrictions node
- Press 'edit'

> expected: dialog to edit the access restrictions globally for this library
< actual: nothing happens

- Press 'remove'

Created an attachment (id=19341)
Attach Edit action, fix remove

Added support for editing AccessRules
When an access rule is removed, an empty AccessRule[] is set instead of null.

as discussed in bug 89497, for M6 we will filter the access rule attribute node
again from the user libraries pref page until we have a homogeneous story for
the all the containers including the JRE container.

-> edit access restrictions node not possible anymore

Thanks Michael anyway.
